## 2024 Standings
```{r rating_data}

rtg_league <- league_data %>%
  filter(!is.na(team_score)) %>%
  filter(round == max(round)) %>%
  mutate(played = wins + draws + losses) %>%
  select(coach, position, played, points, wins, draws, losses, points_for, points_against, pcnt) %>%
  mutate(points_for = round(points_for/played)) %>%
  mutate(points_against = round(points_against/played)) %>%
  mutate(pcnt = round(pcnt,1)) %>%
  mutate(pts = points + (points_for/10000))



sim_data <- read.csv(paste0('../data/2024/simulations/R',vRound,'_sim_smy.csv')) %>%
  select(coach, pcnt_finals, pcnt_gfinal, pcnt_champ, pcnt_spoon)

rtg_pos <- player_data %>%
  select(coach, type, feed_id, last_name, position, round, points) %>%
  filter(!is.na(coach)) %>%
  group_by(coach,position,round) %>%
  summarise(
    n= sum(ifelse(type=='scoring',1,0), na.rm=T),
    pts = sum(ifelse(type=='scoring',points,0), na.rm=T),
    .groups='drop'
  ) %>%
  arrange(coach,position,round) %>%
  group_by(coach, position) %>%
  mutate(n7 = rollapply(n, min(vRound,7),sum,align='right',fill=NA)) %>%
  mutate(pts7 = rollapply(pts, min(vRound,7),sum,align='right',fill=NA)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(!is.na(pts7)) %>%
  mutate(avg7 = round(pts7/n7,1)) %>%
  group_by(position) %>%
  mutate(max = max(avg7)) %>%
  mutate(min = min(avg7)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(rtg = round((avg7-min)/(max-min)*10,3)) %>%
  filter(round == vRound) %>%
  select(coach, position, rtg) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from=position, values_from=rtg)
  

rtg_all <- player_data %>%
  select(coach, type, feed_id, last_name, position, round, points) %>%
  filter(!is.na(coach)) %>%
  group_by(coach,round) %>%
  summarise(
    n= sum(ifelse(type=='scoring',1,0), na.rm=T),
    pts = sum(ifelse(type=='scoring',points,0), na.rm=T),
    .groups='drop'
  ) %>%
  arrange(coach,round) %>%
  group_by(coach) %>%
  mutate(n7 = rollapply(n, min(vRound,7),sum,align='right',fill=NA)) %>%
  mutate(pts7 = rollapply(pts, min(vRound,7),sum,align='right',fill=NA)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(!is.na(pts7)) %>%
  mutate(avg7 = round(pts7/n7,1)) %>%
  mutate(max = max(avg7)) %>%
  mutate(min = min(avg7)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(ALL = round((avg7-min)/(max-min)*10,1)) %>%
  filter(round == vRound) %>%
  select(coach, ALL) 


rtg_tbl <- rtg_league %>%
  left_join(rtg_all, by='coach') %>%
```

```{r rating_table, echo=FALSE}
ladder_cols <- c('pts','wins','draws','losses','points_for','points_against','pcnt')
rating_cols <- c("ALL","DEF","MID","RUC","FWD")
knockout_cols <- c("pcnt_finals","pcnt_gfinal","pcnt_champ","pcnt_spoon")

rtg_tbl <- rtg_tbl[,c('coach',ladder_cols,rating_cols,knockout_cols)] %>%
  arrange(desc(wins),desc(draws),desc(points_for))

rating_column <- function(maxWidth = 55, class = NULL, ...) {
  colDef(maxWidth = maxWidth, align = "center", class = paste("cell number", class), ...)
}
knockout_column <- function(maxWidth = 70, class = NULL, ...) {
  colDef(
    cell = format_pct,
    maxWidth = maxWidth,
    class = paste("cell number", class),
    style = function(value) {
      # Lighter color for <1%
      if (value < 0.01) {
        list(color = "#aaa")
      } else {
        list(color = "#111", background = knockout_pct_color(value))
      }
    },
    ...
  )
}
format_pct <- function(value) {
  if (value == 0) "  \u2013 "    # en dash for 0%
  else if (value == 1) "\u2713"  # checkmark for 100%
  else if (value < 0.01) " <1%"
  else if (value > 0.99) ">99%"
  else formatC(paste0(round(value * 100), "%"), width = 4)
}
make_color_pal <- function(colors, bias = 1) {
  get_color <- colorRamp(colors, bias = bias)
  function(x) rgb(get_color(x), maxColorValue = 255)
}
off_rating_color <- make_color_pal(c("#ff2700", "#f8fcf8", "#44ab43"), bias = 1.3)
def_rating_color <- make_color_pal(c("#ff2700", "#f8fcf8", "#44ab43"), bias = 0.6)
knockout_pct_color <- make_color_pal(c("#ffffff", "#f2fbd2", "#c9ecb4", "#93d3ab", "#35b0ab"), bias = 2)

  ),

    coach = colDef(

      class='cell border-right',
      cell = function(value, index) {
        div(

        )
      }
    ),

    wins = rating_column(name = "W - D - L",  maxWidth = 70,
                         cell = function(value, index) {paste0(value,"-",rtg_tbl[index,'draws'],"-",rtg_tbl[index,'losses'])}),
    draws = colDef(show = FALSE),

    points_for = rating_column(name = "Average Score",maxWidth = 70,class='small-font'),
    points_against = rating_column(name = "Average Against",maxWidth = 70,class='small-font'),
    pcnt = rating_column(name = "%",class='small-font', cell=function(value){format(round(value, 1), nsmall = 1)}),
    
    
    # group = colDef(defaultSortOrder = "asc", align = "center", maxWidth = 75,
    #                class = "cell group", headerStyle = list(fontWeight = 700)),
    ALL = rating_column(format = colFormat(digits = 1), class = "border-left"),

    ),
    MID = rating_column(
      name = "MID",
      cell = function(value) {
        scaled <- value/10
        color <- off_rating_color(scaled)
        value <- format(round(value, 1), nsmall = 1)
        div(class = "spi-rating", style = list(background = color), value)
      }
    ),
    RUC = rating_column(
      name = "RUC",
      cell = function(value) {
        scaled <- value/10
        color <- off_rating_color(scaled)
        value <- format(round(value, 1), nsmall = 1)
        div(class = "spi-rating", style = list(background = color), value)
      }
    ),
    FWD = rating_column(
      name = "FWD",
      cell = function(value) {
        scaled <- value/10

        value <- format(round(value, 1), nsmall = 1)
        div(class = "spi-rating", style = list(background = color), value)
      }
    ),
    pcnt_finals = knockout_column(name = "Make Finals", class = "border-left"),
    pcnt_gfinal = knockout_column(name = "Make Grand Final"),
    pcnt_champ = knockout_column(name = "Win Dawn breaker"),
    pcnt_spoon = knockout_column(name = "Win Spoon")
  ),
  # Emphasize borders between groups when sorting by group
  rowClass = JS("
    function(rowInfo, state) {
      const firstSorted = state.sorted[0]
      if (firstSorted && firstSorted.id === 'group') {
        const nextRow = state.pageRows[rowInfo.viewIndex + 1]
        if (nextRow && rowInfo.row.group !== nextRow.group) {
          return 'group-last'
        }
      }
    }"
  ),
  showSortIcon = FALSE,
  borderless = TRUE,
  class = "standings-table"
)
div(class = "standings",
  tbl
)
```

## Power Rankings {.tabset}

### OVERALL

```{r, power_rankings}

power_rankings <- function(player_data, sml_team_colours_hc, vPos=NULL){
  
  pRanks <- player_data
  
  if(!is.null(vPos)){
    pRanks <- pRanks %>%
      filter(position == vPos)
  }
  
  pRanks <- pRanks %>%
    filter(!is.na(coach)) %>%
    filter(type == 'scoring') %>%
    group_by(round, coach) %>%
    summarise(
      n=n(),
      score = sum(points),
      .groups='drop'
    ) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(avg = round(score/n)) %>%
    arrange(coach, round) %>%
    group_by(coach) %>%
    mutate(avg3 = round(rollapply(score,width=3,sum,align='right',partial=TRUE)/
                        rollapply(n,3,sum,align='right', partial=TRUE),1)) %>%
    ungroup()
  
  # Data for chart
  pRanks_hc <- pRanks %>%
    select(coach, round, avg3) %>%
    group_by(coach) %>%
    do(data = list_parse2(data.frame(.$round, .$avg3))) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    rename(name = coach) %>%
    left_join(sml_team_colours_hc, by=c('name'))
  
  # Power ranking chart
  chart <- highchart() %>%
    hc_title(text=paste0('Power Rankings', ifelse(!is.null(vPos),paste0(' (',vPos,')'),''))) %>%
    hc_subtitle(text='3 Round Average per Player') %>%
    hc_chart(type = 'spline') %>%
    hc_add_series_list(pRanks_hc) 
  
  # Data for heat map
  pRanks_wide <- pRanks %>%
    select(coach, round, avg) %>%
    spread(round, avg)
  
  pRanks_avg3 <- pRanks %>%
    filter(round >= (max(round)-2)) %>%
    group_by(coach) %>%
    summarise(
      avg3 = round(sum(score)/sum(n),1),
      .groups='drop'
    ) 
  
  pRanks_tbl <- pRanks %>%
    group_by(coach) %>%
    summarise(
      avg = round(sum(score)/sum(n),1),
      .groups='drop'
    ) %>%
    left_join(pRanks_avg3, by=c('coach')) %>%
    left_join(pRanks_wide[,rev(names(pRanks_wide))], by=c('coach')) %>%
    arrange(desc(avg3))
  
  # Conditional formatting
  brks <- c(75,80,85,90,95,100,105)-0.01
  clrs <- brewer.pal(8, 'RdYlGn')
  
  # Power rankings table
  table <- datatable(
    pRanks_tbl,
    rownames=FALSE,
    class = 'row-border stripe',
    colnames = c('Coach' = 'coach', 'Avg' = 'avg', '3Rd Avg' = 'avg3'),
    extensions = 'FixedColumns',
    options = list(
      dom = 't',
      scrollX = TRUE,
      fixedColumns = list(leftColumns = 3),
      columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 0:(ncol(pRanks_tbl)-1)))
    )
  ) %>% 
    formatStyle(names(pRanks_tbl[,c(4:ncol(pRanks_tbl))]), 
                backgroundColor = styleInterval(brks, clrs))
  
  # Return object
  return(
    list(chart = chart,
         table = table)
  )

}

pRank_all <- power_rankings(player_data, sml_team_colours_hc)
pRank_def <- power_rankings(player_data, sml_team_colours_hc, 'DEF')
pRank_mid <- power_rankings(player_data, sml_team_colours_hc, 'MID')
pRank_ruc <- power_rankings(player_data, sml_team_colours_hc, 'RUC')
pRank_fwd <- power_rankings(player_data, sml_team_colours_hc, 'FWD')

pRank_all$chart
pRank_all$table
```

## Draft Heat Map
```{r, draft_heat_map_data, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}

player_raw <- get_player_data(sc, round=sc$var$current_round)
draft_raw <- bind_rows(get_sc_data(sc$auth, sc$url$draft))



## Calc player stats -----------------------------------------------------------


rnds <- max(player_raw$played)

heat_map_data <- player_raw %>%
  mutate(avg_adj = round(((avg*played) + ((rnds-played)*ifelse(avg<75,avg,75)))/rnds,1))

# Standardise averages
pos_list <- tibble(
  p = c('DEF','MID','RUC','FWD'),
  n = c(5,7,2,5)
) %>%
  mutate(sum_n = sum(n)) %>%
  mutate(weight = round(n/sum_n,3))

scr_data <- tibble()
overall_smy <- tibble()
for(i in 1:nrow(pos_list)) {
  
  p <- pos_list$p[i]
  n <- pos_list$n[i]
  
  pos_data <- heat_map_data[grepl(p,heat_map_data$pos_1)|grepl(p,heat_map_data$pos_2),]
  
  pos_smy <- pos_data %>%
    select(feed_id, avg_adj) %>%
    arrange(desc(avg_adj)) %>%
    top_n(n*8, avg_adj)
  
  mean<- mean(pos_smy$avg_adj)
  sd<- sd(pos_smy$avg_adj)
  
  scr <- pos_data %>%
    mutate(pos_scr = round((avg_adj - mean)/sd,3)) %>%
    select(feed_id, pos_scr) %>%
    mutate(scr_pos = p)
  
  scr_data <- bind_rows(scr_data, scr)
  overall_smy <- bind_rows(overall_smy, pos_smy)
}  

scr_data <- scr_data %>%
  arrange(desc(pos_scr)) %>%
  distinct(feed_id, .keep_all=T)

mean <- mean(overall_smy$avg_adj)
sd <- sd(overall_smy$avg_adj)

heat_map_data2 <- heat_map_data %>%
  mutate(scr = round((avg_adj - mean)/sd,3)) %>%
  left_join(scr_data, by='feed_id') %>%
  left_join(pos_list[,c('p','weight')], by=c('scr_pos'='p')) %>%
  mutate(scr_wgt = pos_scr*weight + scr*(1-weight)) %>%
  arrange(desc(scr_wgt)) %>%
  mutate(rank = row_number()) %>%
  mutate(name=paste0(substr(first_name,1,1),'.',last_name)) %>%
  select(player_id,name,team_abbrev,avg,avg_adj,scr_wgt, rank)


## Calc Draft data -------------------------------------------------------------


draft_data <- draft_raw %>%
  mutate(asl_order = c(seq(1:8), rep(c(seq(1:8),rev(seq(1:8))), max(draft_raw$round)))[1:nrow(draft_raw)]) %>%
  arrange(round, asl_order) %>%
  mutate(pick = row_number()) %>%
  left_join(heat_map_data %>% select(user_team_id, coach) %>% distinct(),by='user_team_id') %>%
  select(user_team_id,coach,round, pick, player_id) %>%
  right_join(heat_map_data2, by='player_id') %>%
  arrange(round, pick, desc(scr_wgt)) %>%
  mutate(roll_rank = rollapply(-scr_wgt, 8, rank, align='left', fill=NA)) %>%
  mutate(roll_rank = roll_rank[,1])


draft_table_color <- draft_data %>%
  select(coach, round, roll_rank) %>%
  filter(!is.na(coach)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = coach, names_prefix = 'c_', values_from = roll_rank)


draft_table <- draft_data %>%
```

```{r, magoos_of_the_week, echo=FALSE}
motw_data <- player_data %>%
```

## Fixture Strength
```{r, fixture_strength, echo=FALSE}

fs <- league_data %>%
  filter(!is.na(team_score)) %>%
  filter(round <= vRound) %>%
  group_by(round) %>%
  mutate(score_rank = rank(-team_score)) %>%
  mutate(opp_score_rank = rank(-opponent_score)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(coach) %>%
  summarise(
    avg_rank = round(mean(score_rank),2),
    avg_opp_rank = round(mean(opp_score_rank),2)
  ) %>%
  arrange(avg_rank) 

highchart() %>%
  hc_chart(type = 'bar') %>%
  hc_title(text = 'Season Performance') %>%
  hc_subtitle(text= 'Average Rank of Weekly Scores') %>%
  hc_legend(enabled=FALSE) %>%
  hc_xAxis(categories=fs$coach) %>%
  hc_yAxis(min=1,
           max=8,
           tickInterval = 1,
           plotLines = list(list(label=list(text='Average'),value=4.5, color='black', dashStyle='shortdash'))) %>%
  hc_add_series(data=fs$avg_rank, color='green')

fs <- fs %>%
  arrange(avg_opp_rank)

highchart() %>%
  hc_chart(type = 'bar') %>%
  hc_title(text = 'Fixture Difficulty') %>%
  hc_subtitle(text= "Average Rank of Opponent's Weekly Scores") %>%
  hc_legend(enabled=FALSE) %>%
  hc_xAxis(categories=fs$coach) %>%
  hc_yAxis(min=1,
           max=8,
           tickInterval = 1,
           plotLines = list(list(label=list(text='Average'),value=4.5, color='black', dashStyle='shortdash'))) %>%
  hc_add_series(data=fs$avg_opp_rank, color='red')
```

## The one that got away
Difference in averages by coach
```{r}

a <- player_data %>%
  group_by(feed_id) %>%
  mutate(avg = round(mean(points, na.rm=T))) %>%
  filter(type=='scoring') %>%
  group_by(feed_id, last_name, avg, coach) %>%
  summarise(
    coach_avg = round(mean(points, na.rm=T)),
    .groups='drop'
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(avg_diff = coach_avg - avg)

b <- a %>%
  group_by(feed_id) %>%
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    min = min(coach_avg),
    max = max(coach_avg),
    .groups='drop'
  ) %>%
  mutate(coach_diff = round(max-min)) %>%
  select(feed_id, coach_diff, n)

c <- a %>%
  left_join(b, by=c('feed_id')) %>%
  arrange(desc(avg_diff)) %>%
  select(last_name, avg, n, coach_diff, coach, avg_diff) %>%
  spread(coach, avg_diff) %>%
  arrange(desc(coach_diff))


brks <- c(-30,-15,0,15,30)
clrs <- brewer.pal(6, 'RdYlGn')

datatable(
  c,
  rownames=FALSE,
  class = 'row-border stripe',
  colnames = c('Player'='last_name', 'Avg'='avg', 'Delta'='coach_diff', 'N'='n'),
  extensions = 'FixedColumns',
  options = list(
    filter=FALSE,
    pageLength = 10, 
    lengthChange = FALSE,
    paging=TRUE,
    scrollX = TRUE,
    fixedColumns = list(leftColumns = 2),
    columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 1:(ncol(c)-1)))
  )
) %>% 
  formatStyle(names(c[,c(5:ncol(c))]), 
              backgroundColor = styleInterval(brks, clrs))

```
